text: "(Just Like) Starting Over" is a 1980 song by John Lennon. It is the first single from his 1980 album Double Fantasy. It was the last track released in his lifetime and went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, the United States, Australia, Austria, Canada, Ireland, Spain and Switzerland, number 2 in New Zealand and Norway, number 3 in Sweden and number 4 in Germany and South Africa. ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:John Lennon songs Category:The Flaming Lips songs
title: (Just Like) Starting Over
